mapper.select: select a.resume_no as resumeNo, a.requrit_no as requritNo, a.resume_gender as resumeGender, a.resume_detail as resumeDetail, a.member_no as memberNo, a.resume_phone as resumePhone, b.member_name as memberName from resume a join member b on a.member_no = b.member_no where requrit_no =#{requritNo}

select a.resume_no as resumeNo, a.requrit_no as requritNo, a.resume_gender as resumeGender, a.resume_detail as resumeDetail, a.resume_phone as resumePhone, a.member_no as memberNo, b.member_name as memberName from resume a join member b on a.member_no = b.member_no where resume_no = #{resumeNo}
select file_no as fileNo, resume_no as resumeNo, filepath as filepath, filename as filename from resume_tbl where resume_no=#{resumeNo}
